item.title: A mind ill with negative attitudes is more dangerous than a sick body, for its sickness is always contagious.
item.description:
A mind ill with negative attitudes is more dangerous than a sick body, for its sickness is always contagious.

Experts in human behavior have discovered that it is virtually impossible for an individual member of a group not to be affected by other members. Likewise, the group itself is only as strong as its weakest link. It is rarely possible for the entire group to raise itself to higher levels of achievement than that of which the weakest member is capable.

item.title: Cub Lake Hillsdale Michigan
item.description:
Cub Lake Hillsdale Michigan

Cub Lake is located in Hillsdale County, Michigan. This lake is 69 acres in size. It is approximately 43 feet deep at its deepest point. Anglers can expect to catch a variety of fish including Black Crappie, Bluegill, Largemouth Bass, Northern Pike, Sunfish and Yellow Perch.

item.title: Quote of the Day - 12JUL16
item.description:
Quote of the Day - 12JUL16

Consider becoming the type of energy that no matter where you go, or where you are, you always add value to the spaces and lives of those around you. -Unknown

item.title: Where will you be ten years from now if you keep on going the way you are going?
item.description:
Where will you be ten years from now if you keep on going the way you are going?

Many people fail to realize that big success is the result of little successes achieved, often over a very long period of time. Truly successful people are long-term thinkers. They know that they must build upon each achievement and constantly learn new and better ways of doing things

item.title: Deer Creek Wildlife Area State Park
item.description:
Deer Creek Wildlife Area State Park

About 25 percent of the wildlife area consists of second growth hardwoods and brush in advanced stages of succession. The timber stand is mainly on the east side of Deer Creek It includes oak, hickory, elm, black walnut, ash, maple, locust, sycamore, and cottonwood.

item.title: Quote of the Day - 15JUL16
item.description:

What Paul says about Peter tells us more about Paul than about Peter. -Baruch Spinoza
